title: Check Flight Prices
description: Open Google Flights and look up your dream destination. No commitment, just possibilities. Your next adventure is closer than you think, Queen.

title: Vision Board Moment
description: Save one stunning travel photo to your camera roll. Let it remind you what you're building toward. Dream big, Visionary.

title: Passport Check
description: Check your passport expiry date. Nothing kills spontaneous travel faster than an expired passport. Stay ready so you don't have to get ready.

title: Pack Light Practice
description: Pick 5 items you'd bring on a weekend trip. Learning to travel light is a superpower. Less stuff, more freedom.

title: Local Tourist
description: Search for a hidden gem in your own city you've never visited. Adventure doesn't always require a plane ticket, Queen.

title: Learn 'Hello'
description: Look up how to say 'Hello' in a language you've never spoken. Future you will thank present you when you're actually there.

title: Plan Your Escape
description: Research one destination you've been dreaming about. Hotels, activities, vibes. Your future self is already there waiting.

title: Solo Date Night
description: Book a table for one at a restaurant you've been wanting to try. Taking yourself out is the ultimate main character move.

title: Bucket List Brain Dump
description: Write down 10 places you want to visit before you die. No filter, no budget limits. Dream wildly.

title: Travel Fund Start
description: Set up a dedicated savings account or folder for travel. Name it something inspiring. Your adventure fund starts now.

title: Culture Deep Dive
description: Learn one custom or tradition from a country you want to visit. Understanding cultures makes travel richer, Queen.

title: Adventure Buddy
description: Message a friend about a trip idea. Sometimes all it takes is planting the seed. Your travel partner might be one text away.

title: First Class Daydream
description: Price out a business class ticket to your dream destination. Just to dream. You're manifesting luxury, Icon.

title: Celebrate Your Win
description: Write down one professional win from this week. Big or small, you earned it. Queens acknowledge their victories.

title: Unsubscribe Queen
description: Find one temptation email (sales, deals, 'limited offers') and unsubscribe. Protect your peace and your wallet.

title: Inbox Zero Sprint
description: Archive or delete 10 emails right now. A clean inbox is a clean mind. You're clearing space for what matters.

title: LinkedIn Lurk
description: Check out one profile of someone you admire professionally. Study their path. Your roadmap is out there.

title: Skills Inventory
description: List 3 things you're genuinely great at. Not humble, not bragging—just facts. Know your worth, Queen.

title: Negotiate Practice
description: Practice saying 'I'd like to discuss my compensation' out loud. Three times. The six-figure salary starts with your voice, Future CEO.

title: Network Power Move
description: Message one professional connection you admire. A simple 'thinking of you' or share an article. Relationships build empires.

title: Side Hustle Brainstorm
description: Write down 3 ideas for making extra income doing something you enjoy. Multiple streams build wealth, Queen.

title: Meeting Prep Boss
description: Before your next meeting, write 3 talking points. Preparation is the difference between speaking and being heard.

title: Mentor Message
description: Reach out to someone whose career you admire. Ask one thoughtful question. Mentorship starts with a message.

title: Portfolio Polish
description: Update one project in your portfolio or resume. Keep your wins fresh and documented. You're always interview-ready.

title: Salary Research
description: Look up the market rate for your role. Knowledge is power in negotiations. Know your number, Queen.

title: Pitch Perfect
description: Practice your elevator pitch: who you are, what you do, what makes you unique. 30 seconds, confident delivery. Go.

title: Main Character Energy
description: Walk into the next room like you own it. Shoulders back, chin up, slow down. You're not rushing—you're arriving.

title: Dress for You
description: Put on your favorite outfit right now. Not for a meeting, not for a date—just because you deserve to feel amazing today.

title: Mirror Hype
description: Look in the mirror and give yourself three genuine compliments. Out loud. You're building the confidence others wish they had.

title: Gratitude Moment
description: Name three good things in your life right now. Big or small. Gratitude rewires your brain for abundance, Queen.

title: Deep Breath Reset
description: Take 5 slow, deep breaths right now. In through the nose, out through the mouth. Your nervous system will thank you.

title: Say No
description: Decline one thing you don't actually want to do. 'No' is a complete sentence. Your time is your most valuable currency, Queen.

title: Boundaries Boss
description: Set one boundary today. It could be 'I'm not checking emails after 7pm' or 'I'm taking my full lunch break.' Protect your energy.

title: Fear Inventory
description: Name one fear that's holding you back. Write it down. Naming it takes away its power. You're braver than you know.

title: Future Self Letter
description: Write a short note to yourself 5 years from now. What do you hope to tell her? Your future is being written today.

title: Affirmation Record
description: Record a voice memo listing your strengths and what you're proud of. Play it back when you need a boost, Icon.

title: Comparison Detox
description: Unfollow or mute one account that makes you feel 'less than.' Curate your feed like you curate your life, Queen.

title: Comfort Zone Push
description: Do one small thing that scares you today. Send that email. Make that call. Growth lives outside comfort.

title: Face Your Finances
description: Open your bank app and look at your balance. No fear, no judgment. Financial freedom starts with awareness, Future CEO.

title: Subscription Audit
description: List all your recurring subscriptions. Netflix, Spotify, that gym membership. Knowledge is the first step to control.

title: Spare Change Save
description: Transfer $5 to your savings right now. Small moves compound into wealth. Start the habit today, Queen.

title: Bill Check
description: Review one upcoming bill or payment. No surprises, no stress. Financially aware women are financially free.

title: No-Spend Hour
description: Commit to no shopping or online browsing for the next hour. Practice intentional spending. Your wallet will thank you.

title: Net Worth Snapshot
description: Calculate your total net worth: assets minus debts. This number isn't judgment—it's your starting line.

title: Investment 101
description: Research one investment type: index funds, bonds, REITs. Financial literacy is freedom. Start learning today, Queen.

title: Emergency Fund Check
description: Do you have 3 months of expenses saved? Check where you are and set a goal. Security is self-care.

title: Debt Payoff Plan
description: List your debts from smallest to largest. The snowball method works. Pick one to attack first.

title: Money Date
description: Schedule a weekly 15-minute money review in your calendar. Consistency builds wealth. Date your finances, Queen.

title: Negotiate a Bill
description: Call one service provider and ask for a better rate. The worst they can say is no. Fortune favors the bold.

title: Retirement Peek
description: Check your retirement account balance or research how to start one. Future you is counting on present you, Queen.
